price: Kuma, haƙĩƙa, Mun halakar da al'ummomi daga gabãninku, a lõkacin da suka yi zãlunci, kuma manzanninsu suka jẽ musu da hujjõji bayyanannu, amma ba su kasance sunã ĩmãni ba. Kamar wannan ne, Muke sãkãwa ga mutãne mãsu laifi.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā al-qurūna min qablikum lammā ẓalamū wajāathum rusuluhum bil-bayināti wamā kānū liyu'minū kadhālika najzī al-qawma al-muj'rimīna
